unnormalised: Arrey yaar, India really messed up that chase! Needed just 36 runs in the last 5 overs, with 7 wickets in hand. Jadeja scored only 12 off 18 balls! And what was Dhawan doing, scoring just 45 after playing for so long? The final score was 198/8, so close yet so far. Next match, hope they do better than this 20% win percentage game.
normalised: Arrey yaar, India really messed up that chase! Needed just thirty six runs in the last five overs, with seven wickets in hand. Jadeja scored only twelve off eighteen balls! And what was Dhawan doing, scoring just forty five after playing for so long? The final score was one hundred and ninety eight divided by eight, so close yet so far. Next match, hope they do better than this twenty percent win percentage game.
